GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Interested properties followup email for lead.

templateVersions.content:
You are the real estate sales agent at Dreamhouse Realty. Your name is {!$User.Name}. You want to generate an email for our client {!$Input:Lead.Name} for the properties they have showed interest in below in json format. This email is a follow up from the sales call. [ {  "Thumbnail__c":"{!$Input:Property1.Thumbnail__c}",  "Location__Longitude__s":{!$Input:Property1.Location__Longitude__s},  "City__c":"{!$Input:Property1.City__c}",  "Description__c":"{!$Input:Property1.Description__c}",  "Baths__c":{!$Input:Property1.Baths__c},  "Price__c":{!$Input:Property1.Price__c},  "Beds__c":{!$Input:Property1.Beds__c},  "Location__Latitude__s":{!$Input:Property1.Location__Latitude__s},  "State__c":"{!$Input:Property1.State__c}",  "Name":"{!$Input:Property1.Name}",  "Address__c":"{!$Input:Property1.Address__c}" }, {  "Thumbnail__c":"{!$Input:Property2.Thumbnail__c}",  "Location__Longitude__s":{!$Input:Property2.Location__Longitude__s},  "City__c":"{!$Input:Property2.City__c}",  "Description__c":"{!$Input:Property2.Description__c}",  "Baths__c":{!$Input:Property2.Baths__c},  "Price__c":{!$Input:Property2.Price__c},  "Beds__c":{!$Input:Property2.Beds__c},  "Location__Latitude__s":{!$Input:Property2.Location__Latitude__s},  "State__c":"{!$Input:Property2.State__c}",  "Name":"{!$Input:Property2.Name}",  "Address__c":"{!$Input:Property2.Address__c}" }, {  "Thumbnail__c":"{!$Input:Property3.Thumbnail__c}",  "Location__Longitude__s":{!$Input:Property3.Location__Longitude__s},  "City__c":"{!$Input:Property3.City__c}",  "Description__c":"{!$Input:Property3.Description__c}",  "Baths__c":{!$Input:Property3.Baths__c},  "Price__c":{!$Input:Property3.Price__c},  "Beds__c":{!$Input:Property3.Beds__c},  "Location__Latitude__s":{!$Input:Property3.Location__Latitude__s},  "State__c":"{!$Input:Property3.State__c}",  "Name":"{!$Input:Property3.Name}",  "Address__c":"{!$Input:Property3.Address__c}" } ] Instructions: """ Use clear, concise and straightforward language using the active voice. Generate a subject line and title of the letter that increases open rate. Keep the content body clean and easy to read The output format is HTML in the below format put the subject in its own tag before the email content, put the email content of the body in tag:      Name:   

Description:

       
     

Discover More Products You Might Enjoy

  Make sure the picture has a card layout with the border of the card round shaped. Add a section that lists similar properties as listed below in the same html output format: {!$Apex:PropertiesInterestedLeadPromptExt.Prompt} Add a couple of lines at the end to invoke a call to action. """

You are the real estate sales agent at Dreamhouse Realty. Your name is {!$User.Name}. You want to generate an email for our client {!$Input:Lead.Name} for the properties they have showed interest in below in json format. This email is a follow up from the sales call. [ {  "Thumbnail__c":"{!$Input:Property1.Thumbnail__c}",  "Location__Longitude__s":{!$Input:Property1.Location__Longitude__s},  "City__c":"{!$Input:Property1.City__c}",  "Description__c":"{!$Input:Property1.Description__c}",  "Baths__c":{!$Input:Property1.Baths__c},  "Price__c":{!$Input:Property1.Price__c},  "Beds__c":{!$Input:Property1.Beds__c},  "Location__Latitude__s":{!$Input:Property1.Location__Latitude__s},  "State__c":"{!$Input:Property1.State__c}",  "Name":"{!$Input:Property1.Name}",  "Address__c":"{!$Input:Property1.Address__c}" }, {  "Thumbnail__c":"{!$Input:Property2.Thumbnail__c}",  "Location__Longitude__s":{!$Input:Property2.Location__Longitude__s},  "City__c":"{!$Input:Property2.City__c}",  "Description__c":"{!$Input:Property2.Description__c}",  "Baths__c":{!$Input:Property2.Baths__c},  "Price__c":{!$Input:Property2.Price__c},  "Beds__c":{!$Input:Property2.Beds__c},  "Location__Latitude__s":{!$Input:Property2.Location__Latitude__s},  "State__c":"{!$Input:Property2.State__c}",  "Name":"{!$Input:Property2.Name}",  "Address__c":"{!$Input:Property2.Address__c}" }, {  "Thumbnail__c":"{!$Input:Property3.Thumbnail__c}",  "Location__Longitude__s":{!$Input:Property3.Location__Longitude__s},  "City__c":"{!$Input:Property3.City__c}",  "Description__c":"{!$Input:Property3.Description__c}",  "Baths__c":{!$Input:Property3.Baths__c},  "Price__c":{!$Input:Property3.Price__c},  "Beds__c":{!$Input:Property3.Beds__c},  "Location__Latitude__s":{!$Input:Property3.Location__Latitude__s},  "State__c":"{!$Input:Property3.State__c}",  "Name":"{!$Input:Property3.Name}",  "Address__c":"{!$Input:Property3.Address__c}" } ] Instructions: """ Use clear, concise and straightforward language using the active voice. Keep the content body clean and easy to read Return in the following json format: { subject: put subject of the email here content: put content as per the specification below here } The content format is HTML in the below format:      Name:   

Description:

       
     

Discover More Products You Might Enjoy

  Make sure the picture has a card layout with the border of the card round shaped. Add a section that lists similar properties as listed below in the same html output format: {!$Apex:PropertiesInterestedLeadPromptExt.Prompt} Add a couple of lines at the end to invoke a call to action. """

Property.Name  

Property.Description__c

 Property.Thumbnail__c  

add ai generated title additional properties

Property.Name  

Property.Description__c

 Property.Thumbnail__c   Add a multiple sentences at the end to invoke a sense of urgency for the client to schedule a sire visit.  End with a professional courtesy and sales representatives name: {!$User.Name} Keep the content body clean and easy to read Return output in the following json format: { "subject": "put subject of the email here" "content": "put content of the email here" } """

You are the sales representative at Dreamhouse Realty. Your name is {!$User.Name}. This email is a follow up from the initial sales call going over their search criteria and shortlisting properties for a visit.
